name: 3Group-PMC
body:
### Welcome to the 3Group-PMC Page.

This team was conformed with the main purpose of creating an application to help Commercial SMEs to expand or relocate their business with a modern framework for designing map apps with Calcite styles and Bootstrap, using ArcGIS and Open Data initiatives.

[Here](http://3Group-pmc/YourPlace) is the Demo of the application.

[Here](https://github.com/3group-pmc/YourPlace/) the repository of the application.

### Team

Daniel Althviz Mor√© @dalthviz

Ricardo Angel @rangel10

Camilo Mendoza @camendoza94

### Universidad de los Andes
